captions.text: In 2008 we brought you all the hottest dance moves to help keep you in the loop.
But now those moves are old and out of date and you need something new.
So eatyourkimchi now brings you how to dance Kpop 2009.  Oh yeah!
Coming it at number one two three four five six seven.  It's actually eight.  Eight.
Okay, so.  Coming it at number eight is Kara's Mister.
one two three four five six seven
Coming it at number seven is G dragon with his first solo album
Now while there's lots of memorable things about this song,
there's one dance move that's really, really hard to do.
my students try to do it and I try to do it, but we just suck at it.
Okay, this is how it's done.
Coming it at number six is SNSD also know as Girls' Generation with Genie.
Now what made this song famous is their very difficult to do leg flick.
Coming it at number five is 2NE1.  They had a lot of singles this year including "Lollipop"
and the one that hit our list was,
I gotta tell you quietly because,
if I say it too loudly people will break out into dancing.
I DON'T CARE AIR AIR AIR AIR AIR
I DON'T CARE AIR AIR AIR AIR AIR
CUZ I DON'T CARE AIR AIR AIR AIR AIR.
Coming it at number four is 2PM.
They had a whole bunch of singles this year including "Again and Again",
Now "Heartbeat" has a whole bunch of popular dance moves to it.
It's also known as the zombie dance.
Wait a minute.  Is this the right zombie dance?
Hold on, I need to speak to my coordinator.  Spudgy!
Coming it at number three is one of our favorite songs of the year,
and it's actually my ringtone: it's ShinEE's "Ring Ding Dong"
Ring Ding Dong, Ring ding dong.  Ringa ding ringa ding ding ding
Now, even though we love this song very much,
it has one of the most baffling uses of English
that we have ever heard in a Korean song.
And now for a dramatic reading:
Coming it at number 2 is Super Junior's "Sorry Sorry"
Now we're going to present you with the idiot-proof guide to dancing to "Sorry Sorry"
Build a fire.  Build a fire!
Step two: You accidentally dropped the fire.
Drop the fire.  Drop the fire.
Step three: your pants are now on fire
Oh my god!  Oh my god!  Oh my god!  Oh my god!
Put it all together and you've got something like this
It's our favorite song of the year
It has the sexiest music video
And it's got the best dance of the year, too
The dance is so popular that Korean celebrities have been copying it
So without further ado, "Abracadabra" by Brown Eyed Girls
Now that's it for 2009.  And we're gonna cap this all off with a special guest appearance.
Covering "Abracadabra," we present to you, Wonk-Eyed-Dog.

title: How to Dance K Pop Style 2009
